name: Alneu de Andrade Lopes
content: "Home Page of Alneu de Andrade Lopes" Home Page of Alneu de Andrade Lopes I am assistant professor in the University of São Paulo at São Carlos. I am member of the Machine Learning Group (LABIC). My research interests lie in the fields of Machine Learning and Data Mining. In particular I am interested in Graph-Based Relational Learning. More information about our Computer Science Department and University: ·  ICMC at Sao Carlos ·  Universtity of São Paulo My Ph.D. was carried out at the Faculty of Science of the University of Porto.  My MSc was carried out here in the ICMC, and undergraduate studies at Federal University of Mato Grosso do Sul - UFMS. Machine Learning group: LABIC. Research Interests Machine Learning (ML) KDD & DM Graph-Based Learning Complex Networks CV Lattes Additional Material (ICPR 2016) Additional Material (BPCorpus) Contact me at: E-mail: alneu@icmc.usp.br Address: ICMC, University of Sao Paulo Av. Trabalhador São Carlense, 400 Centro P.O. Box 668 13560-970 São Carlos - Brazil
